languages.text: "Каждый воин бьется за что-то. За честь, жизнь, богатство, близких. Немезиту не важно все это — он жертвует близкими, не дорожит честью, не стяжает богатств. Уверена, с жизнью он тоже готов расстаться. Немезит бьется за идею. Значит, туда его и надо ранить. Лишь пустив кровь его идее, ты вынудишь его реагировать. А кто следует за действиями врага, кто реагирует — умирает".

"All warriors fight for something, be it fame, life, wealth, or their loved ones. Nemesite cares nothing for these things: he sacrifices his kin, scorns glory, and amasses no riches. I am sure he would gladly give up his own life if necessary. Nemesite fights for an idea, and so that is where we must strike. Make his idea bleed, and he will be obligated to respond. And whoever is forced to react instead of acting, dies."
languages.original_text: "Каждый воин бьется за что-то. За честь, жизнь, богатство, близких. Немезиту не важно все это — он жертвует близкими, не дорожит честью, не стяжает богатств. Уверена, с жизнью он тоже готов расстаться. Немезит бьется за идею. Значит, туда его и надо ранить. Лишь пустив кровь его идее, ты вынудишь его реагировать. А кто следует за действиями врага, кто реагирует — умирает".

traits.locale_text: "All warriors fight for something, be it honour, life, wealth or their loved ones. Nemesite does not care about any of these things: he sacrifices his loved ones, does not value honour, does not amass riches. And I am sure he is willing to give up his life, too. Nemesite fights for an idea, and so this is where we need to strike. Make his idea bleed, and he will react. And he who is forced to react instead of anticipating, dies."

Nemesite does not care about any of these things: he sacrifices his loved ones, does not value honour, does not amass riches. And I am sure he is willing to give up his life, too. Nemesite fights for an idea, and so this is where we need to strike. Make his idea bleed, and he will react. And he who is forced to react instead of anticipating, dies."

I am sure he would gladly give up even his own life if necessary. Nemesite fights for an idea, and so that is where we must strike. Make his idea bleed, and he will be obligated to respond. And whoever is forced to react instead of act, dies."

And whoever is forced to react instead of acting, dies."

languages.text: "Alle Krieger kämpfen für etwas, ob nun Ruhm, das eigene Leben, Wohlstand oder ihre Lieben. Nemesit interessiert das alles nicht: Er opfert die Seinen, verachtet Ruhm und häuft keine Reichtümer an. Ich bin sicher, er würde mit Freuden sein eigenes Leben geben, falls erforderlich. Nemesit kämpft für eine Idee, und dort müssen wir ihn treffen. Wenn wir seine Idee bluten lassen, muss er reagieren. Und wer nur noch reagiert, statt selbst zu handeln, der wird sterben."
languages.original_text: "All warriors fight for something, be it fame, life, wealth, or their loved ones. Nemesite cares nothing for these things: he sacrifices his kin, scorns glory, and amasses no riches. I am sure he would gladly give up his own life if necessary. Nemesite fights for an idea, and so that is where we must strike. Make his idea bleed, and he will be obligated to respond. And whoever is forced to react instead of acting, dies."

Nemesit kämpft für eine Idee, und dort müssen wir ihn treffen. Wenn wir seine Idee bluten lassen, muss er reagieren. Und wer nur noch reagiert, statt selbst zu handeln, der wird sterben."

languages.text: «Todos los guerreros luchan por algo, ya sea fama, supervivencia, fortuna o sus seres queridos. A Nemesitio no le interesan esas cosas: él sacrifica a los suyos, desprecia la gloria y no amasa riqueza alguna. Seguramente daría gustoso su propia vida de ser necesario. Nemesitio lucha por un ideal, y es justamente ahí donde debemos atacar. Si hacemos que ese ideal sangre, se verá obligado a responder. Y quien se ve obligado a reaccionar en vez de actuar, acaba muriendo».
languages.original_text: "All warriors fight for something, be it fame, life, wealth, or their loved ones. Nemesite cares nothing for these things: he sacrifices his kin, scorns glory, and amasses no riches. I am sure he would gladly give up his own life if necessary. Nemesite fights for an idea, and so that is where we must strike. Make his idea bleed, and he will be obligated to respond. And whoever is forced to react instead of acting, dies."

A Nemesitio no le interesan esas cosas: él sacrifica a los suyos, desprecia la gloria y no amasa riqueza alguna. Seguramente daría gustoso su propia vida de ser necesario. Y quien se ve obligado a reaccionar en vez de actuar, acaba muriendo».

languages.text: 「すべての戦士は、名声、生命、富、愛する者、そういったことのために戦うわ。親族を犠牲にして栄光を下に見て、富を築くこともない。必要であれば、喜んで自分の命を投げ出すに違いないわ。ネメサイトは思想のために戦う。そこを攻撃すれば、彼は反応せざるを得なくなるでしょうね。そして、行動より先に反応をしてしまった者は命を落とすの」
languages.original_text: "All warriors fight for something, be it fame, life, wealth, or their loved ones. Nemesite cares nothing for these things: he sacrifices his kin, scorns glory, and amasses no riches. I am sure he would gladly give up his own life if necessary. Nemesite fights for an idea, and so that is where we must strike. Make his idea bleed, and he will be obligated to respond. And whoever is forced to react instead of acting, dies."

traits.locale_text: 「すべての戦士は、名声、生命、富、愛する者、そういったことのために戦うわ。親族を犠牲にして栄光を下に見て、富を築くこともない。必要であれば、喜んで自分の命を投げ出すに違いないわ。ネメサイトは思想のために戦う。そこを攻撃すれば、彼は反応せざるを得なくなるでしょうね。そして、行動より先に反応をしてしまった者は命を落とすの」

languages.text: “每位战士都会为了某些东西而战，可能是名誉、生命、财富，也可能是他们珍爱的人，但涅墨斯特对这一切都漠不关心。他牺牲亲人，藐视荣耀，鄙夷财富。而且我相信，如果有必要的话，他也会很乐意献出生命。涅墨斯特为了理想而战，所以我们必须打击他的理想，让他的理想血流不止。这样一来，他就不得不做出回应。失去了主动权，被迫反击的那一方将注定灭亡。”
languages.original_text: "All warriors fight for something, be it fame, life, wealth, or their loved ones. Nemesite cares nothing for these things: he sacrifices his kin, scorns glory, and amasses no riches. I am sure he would gladly give up his own life if necessary. Nemesite fights for an idea, and so that is where we must strike. Make his idea bleed, and he will be obligated to respond. And whoever is forced to react instead of acting, dies."

traits.locale_text: “每位战士都会为了某些东西而战，可能是名誉、生命、财富，也可能是他们珍爱的人，但涅墨斯特对这一切都漠不关心。他牺牲亲人，藐视荣耀，鄙夷财富。而且我相信，如果有必要的话，他也会很乐意献出生命。涅墨斯特为了理想而战，所以我们必须打击他的理想，让他的理想血流不止。这样一来，他就不得不做出回应。失去了主动权，被迫反击的那一方将注定灭亡。”

languages.text: « Que ce soit pour la gloire, la survie, la richesse ou leurs proches, tous les guerriers se battent pour quelque chose. Némésite, lui, se fiche éperdument de tout cela : il est prêt à sacrifier les siens, la célébrité ne lui inspire que du mépris et les biens matériels ne l'intéressent pas. Je suis sûre qu'il serait prêt à donner sa vie si nécessaire. Notre homme se bat pour un idéal, et c'est là qu'il nous faut frapper. Si nous portons atteinte à ses convictions, il sera obligé de répondre. Et qui en est réduit à réagir au lieu de prendre l'initiative est condamné à une mort certaine. »
languages.original_text: "All warriors fight for something, be it fame, life, wealth, or their loved ones. Nemesite cares nothing for these things: he sacrifices his kin, scorns glory, and amasses no riches. I am sure he would gladly give up his own life if necessary. Nemesite fights for an idea, and so that is where we must strike. Make his idea bleed, and he will be obligated to respond. And whoever is forced to react instead of acting, dies."

traits.locale_text: « Que ce soit pour la gloire, la survie, la richesse ou leurs proches, tous les guerriers se battent pour quelque chose. Némésite, lui, se fiche éperdument de tout cela : il est prêt à sacrifier les siens, la célébrité ne lui inspire que du mépris et les biens matériels ne l'intéressent pas. Je suis sûre qu'il serait prêt à donner sa vie si nécessaire. Notre homme se bat pour un idéal, et c'est là qu'il nous faut frapper. Si nous portons atteinte à ses convictions, il sera obligé de répondre. Et qui en est réduit à réagir au lieu de prendre l'initiative est condamné à une mort certaine. »

languages.text: "Tüm savaşçılar bir şey için savaşır. Bu bazen şandır, bazen yaşam, bazen zenginlik, bazense sevdikleri kişiler. Nemezit bunların hiçbirini önemsemiyor. Kendi türünü kurban ediyor, şanı hor görüyor ve herhangi bir hazineye göz ucuyla bakmıyor. Gerektiği takdirde kendi yaşamını da seve seve vereceğine eminim. Nemezit bir fikir uğruna savaşıyor ve biz de tam olarak buraya saldırmalıyız. Bu fikri yaralarsan yanıt vermek zorunda kalır. Ve eyleme geçmek yerine reaksiyon vermek zorunda kalan kişi ölür."
languages.original_text: "All warriors fight for something, be it fame, life, wealth, or their loved ones. Nemesite cares nothing for these things: he sacrifices his kin, scorns glory, and amasses no riches. I am sure he would gladly give up his own life if necessary. Nemesite fights for an idea, and so that is where we must strike. Make his idea bleed, and he will be obligated to respond. And whoever is forced to react instead of acting, dies."
